title: Core Competency Development Program through Open Educational Practices (OEP)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Program for early-career professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to enhance collaborative problem-solving skills using open educational resources in simulated environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world job scenarios with 80% accuracy and propose solutions using OEP tools
Learners can iteratively improve OEP activity designs by applying Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology
Learners can predict variables and develop response strategies for potential issues in educational activity design through conjecture mapping
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
